gettingStarted.title: Welcome to LibreTime!
gettingStarted.intro: Here's how you can get started using LibreTime to automate your broadcasts:

step1.title: Upload audio tracks
step1.description: Click the 'Upload' button in the left corner to upload tracks to your library.

step2.title: Schedule a show
step2.description: Click on 'Calendar in the navigation bar on the left. From there clikc on the '+ New Show' button and fill out the required fields.

step3.title: Add tracks to your show
step3.description: Click on your show in the calendar and select 'Schedule Show'. In the popup window drag tacks into your show.

gettingStarted.moreInfo: For more detailed help, read the user manual.
